definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
permanent member state (of UN Security Council)

sentences.english: Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韦丹塔界定真正作为常任理事国和虚幻是暂时的。

sentences.english: And as for 15 years, rice at permanent residents, the acclaimed by the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 又担任拉赖因堡15年常任市长，深受市民的拥戴。

sentences.english: The second part analyses the condition of experimental unit of the system of standing party congress in county and city.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，县市党的代表大会常任制试点情况分析。

sentences.english: The third part offers some assumptions to perfect the system of standing party congress.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，健全党的代表大会常任制的设想。

sentences.english: Delisting requires the assent of the five permanent members of the UN security council.
sentences.chinese: 撤销名字需要联合国安理会五个常任理事国的同意。

sentences.english: This will be Turkey's fourth time sitting on the council.
sentences.chinese: 这将是土耳其第四次担任安理会非常任理事国。

sentences.english: Lewen agreed to run the program until a permanent director could be found.
sentences.chinese: 卢恩女士同意在找到常任校长前负责运作这一项目。

sentences.english: The CPC has explored the system of standing party congress in the close period.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，新时期党对党代会常任制的有益探索。

sentences.english: Experience has proved that the system of Party representatives must not be abolished.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，健全党的代表大会常任制的设想。

sentences.english: Russia is one of the council’s five veto-holding, permanent members.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯是拥有否决权的五个安理会常任理事国之一。

definition: to hold several jobs at once/concurrent post/working part-time
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
first person to be appointed to a post
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
